exercise-tasks.description: List all people with their city names
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  People.Name AS PersonName,
  Cities.Name AS CityName
FROM People
INNER JOIN Cities ON People.CityID = Cities.CityID
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT People.Name AS PersonName, Cities.Name AS CityName FROM People INNER JOIN Cities ON People.CityID = Cities.CityID

exercise-tasks.description: Show people with their city and country names
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  p.Name AS PersonName,
  c.Name AS CityName,
  co.Name AS CountryName
FROM People p
INNER JOIN Cities c ON p.CityID = c.CityID
INNER JOIN Countries co ON c.CountryID = co.CountryID
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT p.Name AS PersonName, c.Name AS CityName, co.Name AS CountryName FROM People p INNER JOIN Cities c ON p.CityID = c.CityID INNER JOIN Countries co ON c.CountryID = co.CountryID

exercise-tasks.description: List people who live in cities with a population over 5 million, including city and country
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  p.Name AS PersonName,
  c.Name AS CityName,
  co.Name AS CountryName
  FROM People p
INNER JOIN Cities c ON p.CityID = c.CityID
INNER JOIN Countries co ON c.CountryID = co.CountryID
WHERE c.Population > 5000000
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT p.Name AS PersonName, c.Name AS CityName, co.Name AS CountryName FROM People p INNER JOIN Cities c ON p.CityID = c.CityID INNER JOIN Countries co ON c.CountryID = co.CountryID WHERE c.Population > 5000000

exercise-tasks.description: Count the number of people per country
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  co.Name AS CountryName,
  COUNT(p.PersonID) AS NumPeople
FROM Countries co
INNER JOIN Cities c ON co.CountryID = c.CountryID
INNER JOIN People p ON p.CityID = c.CityID
GROUP BY co.Name
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT co.Name AS CountryName, COUNT(p.PersonID) AS NumPeople FROM Countries co INNER JOIN Cities c ON co.CountryID = c.CountryID INNER JOIN People p ON p.CityID = c.CityID GROUP BY co.Name
